thread.section_title: Hotel Edouard 7 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great boutique hotel!
thread.title_full: Great boutique hotel! - Review of Hotel Edouard 7, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Matt C
title: Great boutique hotel!
text: We have stayed at the Edouard 7 on a number of occasions. The hotel is well located in the Opera district, walkable to most attractions including the Louvre, and has a brilliant view of the Palais Garnier. The hotel has a boutique and upmarket feel, with a smart reception area and comfortable rooms. Rooms are on the small side as to be expected with central Paris, but are modern. Breakfast good quality.
